thread.title: Barry A. Mac Ban is recognized by Continental Who's Who among Pinnacle Professionals
thread.title_full: Barry A. Mac Ban is recognized by Continental Who's Who among Pinnacle Professionals - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Barry A. Mac Ban is recognized by Continental Who's Who among Pinnacle Professionals
text:
Continental Who's Who
TUCSON, Ariz. , Oct. 12, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Barry A. Mac Ban is recognized by Continental Who's Who among Pinnacle Professionals in the field of Legal Services as a result of his role as Managing Partner with Mac Ban Law .
A seasoned attorney with over forty years of experience, Barry specializes in the following areas: personal injury, wrongful death, commercial litigation, products liability, medical malpractice, environmental law and more.
Board Certified in Personal Injury and Wrongful Death, Barry has a significant presence in the legal industry. He is a member of the section on Litigation of the American Bar Association and is an Officer of the Trial Practice section with the State Bar of Arizona .
A Fellow of the American College of Trial Lawyers, Barry maintains affiliation with the Maricopa County Bar Association, Pima County Bar Association, American Board of Trial Advocates and the International Academy of Trial Lawyers.
Throughout the course of his education and training, Barry earned both his Juris Doctor and Bachelor's degree from Arizona State University .
For more information, please visit www.macbanlaw.com
Contact: Robert Basilin , 516-825-5634 pr@continentalwhoswho.com
